so in order for men to receive this

the earth is the great plain of the
probation

i do not mean by this that deeds do not

let men live the most exemplary lives

a good man approaches near to the image

so i say the more a man lives in

but why should men be satisfied with the

the image may satisfy some who are

no man can really live a good moral life

and i do not believe that any man who

for if so he is rejecting the greatest

so let not men be content with trying to

and not think the earth a mere stopping

the earth life is a fleeting shadow of
